short_summary: This contract is for the installation of draft wells at the site of major events.
description: Details of the contract is available in the contract documents.
full_summary:
**Principal Point of Entry**
============================
* **Project Title** (_Installation of Dredging Wells_)
* **Reference Number** (_cb-715-91472745_)
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-10
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-19T14:00:00
* **Contracting Date**: October 7, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: November 29, 2024

**Procurement Overview**
------------------------

The National Battlefields Commission (NBC) requires the installation of dredging wells at major events sites. Bidders are encouraged to submit a Proposal only if they meet the minimum qualifications and requirements outlined within the call for tenders.

Delivery of Work
----------------

The bidder must ensure all work is completed within the contract timeline, which includes launching the project from October 7, 2024, with a concluding deadline of November 29, 2024.

Please make note that the government reserves the right to negotiate contract conditions with suppliers.

Submission Requirements
----------------------

To ensure a proposal is admissible, the_NBC GTA must be received via electronic means—via email with acknowledgement. If submitted by post, proposals must be sealed. Please note that only standard business hours will be considered.

Suppliers seeking more information can contact:

Lafrenière, Philippe
Email: [philippe.lafreniere@ccbn-nbc.gc.ca](mailto:philippe.lafreniere@ccbn-nbc.gc.ca)
Phone: 418-948-2260

Early notice of technical and contractual inquiries is crucial, with five (5) calendar days prior to the call for tenders closue required for prompt reply.

Tenders not meeting these requirements will not be considered.

All proposals can be accessed, viewable, and downloaded at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

The **official language of communication** will be English; however, responses to letters sent in French will be deemed acceptable.

Contact location:
835, avenue Wilfrid-Laurier
Québec, Québec, G1R 2L3
Canada

Connections with:

Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
